絬字的基本解释

絬
xiè
〔絬衣〕古同“亵衣”，贴身的内衣。
坚韧；牢固。

絬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》私列切，入薛，心。］
形容丝等坚韧；牢固。

絬字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絬； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页923第14
【廣韻】私列切，音薛。【說文】《論語》曰：絬裘長，短右袂。○按今本《論語》作褻。　又【玉篇】堅也。

絬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
絬字的起名意思

暂无。

絬
Basic explanation of words
絬
xiè
〔絬衣〕The ancient same "Xie Yi", intimate underwear.
Tough; firm.
絬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guangyun" private column cut, enter Xue, heart. ]
Describes the toughness of silk; firm.

[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　絬; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 923 14
[Guang Yun] Private column cut, sound Xue. [Said the text] "The Analects of Confucius" said: Qiqiu is long and short right robe. ○According to the current "Analects of Confucius" as indecent.　[Jade articles] Jian Ye.
